name: Middle Eastern Beet Hummus Toasts
author: Nature's Own
summary: Add a splash of color to any party with this easy appetizer of Middle Eastern-inspired roasted beet hummus spread over multigrain bread and topped with seeds and chives.
ingredients: 1 pound beets - trimmed, peeled, and cut into 1-inch pieces
8 slices Nature's Own® Perfectly Crafted Multigrain Bread, toasted
directions: Place beets in a 10x15x1-inch baking pan and drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil; toss to coat
Roast for 35 to 40 minutes or until very tender, stirring once
Remove from oven and let cool slightly, about 30 minutes
Transfer cooled beets to a food processor
Add Greek yogurt, remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, garlic, salt, and black pepper
Process until smooth, stopping to scrape sides as necessary
Spread beet mixture onto toasted bread
Top with pumpkin seeds, sesame seeds, coriander seeds, fennel seeds, and chives
